page.title: 19CHURCHES
page.content: The only place of worship in the whole area is the church of{St.John the {Baptist,}in{Hunsingore.}It belongs to the{Church of England }and was built by the{Dent}family about a hundred years ago at the same time as the{ {School.}People who belong to other religious faiths must go to other villages for their services,but any of them may be buried in the graveyard.It is also the only place licensed for weddings.There is no vicar at present, an appointment has been made and he is due to start at the end of July.At one time each village church had its own vicar,but now 4 churches are in the care of the same vicar.The churches take turns in arranging the services. There are at least 2 services a month at{Hunsingore.}Most of the people who live in the area belong to the{Church {of England}but few go to church often.
